restroom.description:
You arrive in a restroom. An usual one. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

attic.description:
You've fallen into an usual room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be usual. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the attic.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

kitchen.description:
You're now in a kitchen. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You see a table. The table is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the table you can see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west.

steam room.description:
You've entered a steam room. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You can see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] drawer.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The drawer is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a shelf. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the shelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You see a counter. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. This always happens, here in TextWorld![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

bedchamber.description:
You find yourself in a bedchamber.

 You make out a desk. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the desk.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing is empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

study.description:
Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the study.

 You can make out a case.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The case contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The case is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

laundry place.description:
Of every laundry place you could have walked into, you had to come round an ordinary one.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a bench. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the bench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west.

studio.description:
You find yourself in a studio. A typical one. The room is well lit.

 You see an armchair. The armchair is standard.[if there is something on the s_5] On the armchair you can see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You swear loudly.[end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a mantle. The mantle is normal.[if there is something on the s_6] On the mantle you can see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

closet.description:
You have entered the most typical of all possible closets.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

salon.description:
You've just shown up in a salon.

 You scan the room, seeing a recliner. The recliner is typical.[if there is something on the s_7] On the recliner you can see [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.
